og.Description: The Nevada Legislature passed a bill, which establishes a conclusive presumption that a worker is an independent contractor if certain conditions are met. However, Nevada employers must still exercise caution when designating workers as independent contractors. Read on to see what the new requirements are for designating independent contractors and employees.
og.Title: Nevada: Beware when designating workers as independent contractors

article_metadata.description: Latest HR News - Human resources News on Independent Contractors
